questions.questionText: In the 'Back To the Future' trilogy, at what speed does the DeLorean need to be going to travel through time?
Which is the James Bond film that features the classic line, 'No Mr. Bond, I expect you to die' ?
What national monument do Cary Grant and Eva Marie Saint find themselves nearly falling off of in the 'North by Northwest'?
Complete the quote from 'Mean Girls': "On Wednesdays, we ______ "

answers.3: do mean things, because we are very mean girls. Hence, the title for the film you are currently watching!
